User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

QuoteRequest.title: Quote Request
QuoteRequest.description: Represents a user's request for a price quote.

name.description: The full name of the person requesting the quote.

email.description: The email address of the person.

phone.description: The phone number of the person.

company.description: The name of the company the person represents (optional).

message.description: The detailed message of the quote request.

status.description: The current status of the quote request.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the quote request was created.

HomepageContent.title: Homepage Content
HomepageContent.description: Stores the editable content for the homepage.

logoUrl.description: URL for the site logo in the header.

heroTitle.description: Main title in the hero section.

heroImageUrl.description: Background image URL for the hero section.

aboutTitle.description: Title for the About Us section.

aboutText.description: Main text content for the About Us section.

aboutImageUrl.description: Image URL for the About Us section.
